title: Harmless race condition in tutorial
raw_output: Issue 4099 reports a harmless race condition in the tutorial code. The fix involves updating the tutorial's auth module and its documentation. Predicted files: (1) examples/tutorial/flaskr/auth.py - the tutorial auth code with the race condition. (2) docs/tutorial/views.rst - the tutorial documentation showing the code. Exploration: This is a tutorial fix, not a Flask core change. No CHANGES.rst entry needed for tutorial updates. The two files cover both the example code and its documentation.
